snippet: A century ago Columbia Heights was “the most fashionable street in Brooklyn,” and it remains highly desirable today.
abstract: Christopher Gray Streetscapes column on the history of Columbia Heights, Brooklyn Heights street once deemed the most fashionable street in Brooklyn; homes there are still highly sought-after, with some that have waterfront views trading for as much as $10 million.
lead_paragraph: A century ago Columbia Heights was “the most fashionable street in Brooklyn,” and it remains highly desirable today.

headline.print_headline: Still in Fashion, a Century Later
headline.seo: Brooklyn Heights/Streetscapes - Still in Fashion, a Century Later
headline.main: Still in Fashion, a Century Later
